name: Roped
description:
------------------How To Play------------------

                          Player 1                                                                            Player 2

Walk with ASD and jump with W                     Walk and jump with arrow keys

The goal for both of the players is to the glowing platforms and stand on them at the same time, but if you go too far from each other the rope will cut and you lose. So you have to stick together. There's also spikes you have to dodge and more. It is recommended to be two people playing the game but it works perfectly being only one aswell!
